<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Widget Information"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/dashboard/{dashboardID}/widget/{widgetID}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve the complete JSON structure of the dashboard widget, including all settings and data/resource instructions used to populate the widget's data.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"dashboardID","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"(Type a dashboard ID)"}},{"name":"widgetID","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"(Type a widget ID)"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
